achievements.name: Welcome to Los Santos
achievements.description: You repo'd a car and raced it through the heart of a sun-soaked metropolis.
achievements.howTo: Complete Franklin and Lamar

achievements.name: A Friendship Resurrected
achievements.description: With friends like this who needs enemies?
achievements.howTo: Complete Fame Or Shame.

achievements.name: A Fair Day's Pay
achievements.description: It's time for a little getaway.
achievements.howTo: Complete Caida Libre.

achievements.name: The Moment of Truth
achievements.description: You have uncovered the truth about Brad.
achievements.howTo: Discover the truth about Brad.

achievements.name: To Live or Die in Los Santos
achievements.description: Completed the final mission.
achievements.howTo: Complete the final mission.

achievements.name: Diamond Hard
achievements.description: You cleaned out Vangelico to pay back Martin Madrazo.
achievements.howTo: Complete the Jewel Store Job.

achievements.name: Subversive
achievements.description: You stole an experimental super weapon from Merryweather... and gave it back.
achievements.howTo: Complete The Merryweather Heist.

achievements.name: Blitzed
achievements.description: You performed a classic blitz play.
achievements.howTo: Complete Blitz Play

achievements.name: Small Town, Big Job
achievements.description: You made a big impression at the Paleto Bay Chicken Festival.
achievements.howTo: Complete The Paleto Score.

achievements.name: The Government Gimps
achievements.description: You recovered sensitive information from a highly defended federal building.
achievements.howTo: Complete The Bureau Raid.

achievements.name: The Big One!
achievements.description: This ain't no dream no more.
achievements.howTo: Complete The Big Score.

achievements.name: Solid Gold, Baby!
achievements.description: You earned 70 Gold Medals on Missions and Strangers and Freaks.
achievements.howTo: Earn 70 Gold Medals on Missions and Strangers and Freaks.

achievements.name: Career Criminal
achievements.description: You attained 100% Game Completion.
achievements.howTo: Attain 100% Game Completion.

achievements.name: San Andreas Sightseer
achievements.description: You explored all of Los Santos and Blaine County.
achievements.howTo: Explore all of Los Santos and Blaine County.

achievements.name: All's Fare in Love and War
achievements.description: You purchased Downtown Cab Co. and completed a private fare.
achievements.howTo: Purchase Downtown Cab Co. and complete a private fare.

achievements.name: TP Industries Arms Race
achievements.description: You purchased McKenzie Field Hangar and won the arms race.
achievements.howTo: Purchase McKenzie Field Hangar and win the arms race.

achievements.name: Multi-Disciplined
achievements.description: You attained a gold medal in all applicable hobbies and pastimes.
achievements.howTo: Attain a gold medal in all applicable hobbies and pastimes.

achievements.name: From Beyond the Stars
achievements.description: You collected and returned all spaceship parts to Omega.
achievements.howTo: Collect and return all spaceship parts.

achievements.name: A Mystery, Solved
achievements.description: You solved the mystery of Leonora Johnson.
achievements.howTo: Solve the mystery of Leonora Johnson.

achievements.name: Waste Management
achievements.description: You purchased the old dock and collected all nuclear waste.
achievements.howTo: Purchase the old dock and collect all nuclear waste.

achievements.name: Red Mist
achievements.description: You completed all Rampages.
achievements.howTo: Complete all Rampages.

achievements.name: Show Off
achievements.description: You completed all Stunt Jumps.
achievements.howTo: Complete all Stunt Jumps.

achievements.name: Kifflom!
achievements.description: You completed the Epsilon program and achieved inner peace.
achievements.howTo: Complete your path to enlightenment... or not.

achievements.name: Three Man Army
achievements.description: You survived for 3 minutes on at least a 3 star Wanted Level with all three characters together.
achievements.howTo: Survive 3 minutes on at least a 3 star Wanted Level with all three characters together off mission.

achievements.name: Out of Your Depth
achievements.description: You needed a bigger boat... or ANY boat!
achievements.howTo: You're gonna need a bigger boat...

achievements.name: Altruist Acolyte
achievements.description: You delivered an unsuspecting victim to the Altruist Cult.
achievements.howTo: Deliver an unsuspecting victim to the Altruist Cult.

achievements.name: A Lot of Cheddar
achievements.description: You spent a total of $200 million across all three characters.
achievements.howTo: Spend a total of $200 million across all three characters.

achievements.name: Trading Pure Alpha
achievements.description: You made a profit over your total investments in the stock market.
achievements.howTo: Make a profit over your total investments in the stock market.

achievements.name: Pimp My Sidearm
achievements.description: You fully modded a weapon.
achievements.howTo: Fully mod a weapon.

achievements.name: Wanted: Alive Or Alive
achievements.description: You delivered a bail bond target alive.
achievements.howTo: Deliver a bail bond target alive.

achievements.name: Los Santos Customs
achievements.description: You fully modded a vehicle.
achievements.howTo: Fully mod a vehicle.

achievements.name: Close Shave
achievements.description: You completed all Under the Bridge and Knife Flight challenges.
achievements.howTo: Complete all Under the Bridge and Knife Flight challenges.

achievements.name: Off the Plane
achievements.description: You completed the GTA Online Introduction.
achievements.howTo: GTA Online: Complete the Introduction.

achievements.description: You reached Rank 25 in GTA Online.

achievements.description: You reached Rank 50 in GTA Online.
achievements.howTo: GTA Online: Reach Rank 50.

achievements.howTo: GTA Online: Reach Rank 100.

achievements.description: You obtained first place in all competitive game types.

achievements.description: You used custom vehicles to win 5 Races.
achievements.howTo: GTA Online: Use custom vehicles to win 5 Races.

achievements.name: Unnatural Selection
achievements.description: You completed all 10 waves of a Survival.
achievements.howTo: GTA Online: Complete all 10 waves of a Survival.

achievements.description: You directed a driver to 1st place as co-driver in Rally Mode.
achievements.howTo: GTA Online: Direct a driver to 1st place as co-driver in Rally Mode.

achievements.name: Run Like The Wind
achievements.description: You survived for a day with a Bounty on your head.
achievements.howTo: GTA Online: Survive for a day with a Bounty on your head.

achievements.name: Clean Sweep
achievements.description: You finished a Gang Attack without dying and killed at least 10 enemies.
achievements.howTo: GTA Online: Finish a Gang Attack without dying and kill at least 10 enemies.

achievements.name: Decorated
achievements.description: You earned 30 Platinum Awards in GTA Online.

achievements.name: Stick Up Kid
achievements.description: You held up all 20 Stores.
achievements.howTo: GTA Online: Hold up all 20 Stores.

achievements.description: You participated in everything Los Santos has to offer.

achievements.name: American Dream

achievements.howTo: GTA Online: Own an Apartment, Garage and an Insured Vehicle.

achievements.name: A New Perspective
achievements.description: Play GTA V for 15 hours in first person mode.
achievements.howTo: You played GTA V in first person mode for 15 hours.

achievements.howTo: GTA Online: Complete a Heist Setup mission.

achievements.name: Live a Little

achievements.howTo: Create and export 10 videos using the Rockstar Editor.
